奫字的基本解释

奫
yūn
水深广的样子：“（万仞之渊）方其静也，沉奫涵蓄，不震不激，泊乎无声。”
泉水。

奫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yūn］
［《廣韻》於倫切，平真，影。］
(1)泉水。
(2)水深貌。

奫字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【大字部】　奫； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页253第28
【廣韻】於倫切【集韻】紆倫切，?音贇。奫潫，水深廣貌。【左思·吳都賦】泓澄奫潫。【元結·樂歌】聖德至深兮，奫奫如淵。

奫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
奫字的起名意思

指水深的样子，也指泉水。

奫
Basic explanation of words
奫
yūn
The water is deep and wide: "(Thousand Renzhiyuan) Fang Qijing is also quiet, Shen Xihan accumulates, it is not shocking or exciting, and it is silent."
spring.
奫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yūn］
["Guangyun" Yu Lunqie, plain, shadow. ]
(1) Spring water.
(2) Water depth appearance.
奫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Da Zi Department] 　奫; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 253 28
[Guangyun] Yu Lunqie [Jiyun] Yun Lunqie,? Yin Yun. The water is deep and wide. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Hong Chengxiong. [Yuanjie·Lege] The holy virtue is deep, and the wives are like the abyss.

Name meaning
Refers to the depth of the water, and also refers to spring water.
